attributes.action: reconsider his change in the law which has increased the legal age to buy tobacco based products to 18
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We think it is unfair that we have legally been allowed to buy tobacco based products for some time now and suddenly overnight we were not longer able to as of 1st october this year.
As future voters this decision really turn us off politics and it has already caused an increase in anti social behaviour.
